medium: Etching, drypoint, and roulette printed with plate tone
title: Une Matinée d'Hiver au quai de l'Hotel Dieu
marks: Signature, Date and Stamp LLC, in the print: [Felix Buhot / 1876]
description: four carriages--two with drivers sitting on benches on front exterior of carriages--next to a city sidewalk in the rain; buildings beyond; three figures on sidewalk--one with an umbrella accompanied by a dog; band at bottom below image has sketchy tiny images of buildings, carriages, woman\'s boots and dog
